text: Mevlüt (from ) is a Turkish given name for males. People named Mevlüt include: * Mevlüt Çavuşoğlu, Turkish diplomat and politician; current Minister of Foreign Affairs of Turkey * Mevlüt Erdinç, Franco-Turkish footballer, who plays for Paris Saint-Germain as a defender * Mevlüt Mert Altıntaş, assassin of Russian Ambassador to Turkey Andre Karlov Category:Turkish masculine given names
title: Mevlüt
